extendedInfo.description: SmartTube is a video player for YouTube, Dailymotion and Vimeo.Watch internet videos through a single player.Watch the worldâs videos. Enjoy Music videos, Gameplay videos.Discover the Billboard, iTunes music charts.â¶ YouTube, Dailymotion and Vimeoâ¶ Repeat, Shuffle, Continuous playbackâ¶ Manage playlists â¶ Manage my interestsâ¶ Recommended content guide (1,000+)â¶ Most popular/feature videos â¶ Related videosâ¶ Rotation lock, Touch lockâ¶ Switch video quality - SD, HD, Full-HDâ¶ App launch passcode lock- Featuresâ Search for Videos, Channels and Playlists : YouTube, Dailymotion and Vimeoâ Unlimited Streaming of videosâ Most popular videos, Feature videosâ Enjoy the vast video catalog (Recommended Channel/Keyword 1,000+)â Manage My Interests Channel/Keyword/Videos.â Create and manage playlists (including add, remove, move)â Easy search (auto-suggest search queries, search history)â Sort search queries by Relevance, View Count or Dateâ Related videosâ Uploader's videos and playlistsâ Supports fullscreen playback (Portrait/landscape mode)â Shuffle/Repeat/Continuous playback, Rotation Lock, Touch Lockâ Supports HD, Full-HD videosâ Switch video quality - SD(360p), HD(720p and 1080p) availableâ Share videos (Facebook/Twitter/SMS/Emailâ¦)â Connect to YouTube/Dailymotion/Vimeo account (Access to Watch Later, My Uploads, Playlistsâ¦)â App Launch Lock - Passcode protect your videosâ Connect to Facebook account (My Uploads)â Discover the Billboard Hot 100, iTunes music chartsâ Discover the Melon K-Pop music chartsâ And moreâ¦This application does not download videos from YouTube because of the Terms of service.

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: Can watch all videos in HD including vimeo, where as the actual vimeo app doesn\'t have hd quality.  Best part is that you can switch from 3 video sites.
reviews.author: antoine chun

reviews.title: Just what I needed.
reviews.comment: For some reason YouTube was of poor quality on my Note 2 through 3g when I was out and about....On this the quality is superb. HD playback looks flawless.. Well worth 59p upgrade to get rid of ads... Nice one to the development team.
reviews.author: Karl Farrier

reviews.title: A
reviews.comment: Works well on my HTC phone. Able to look up videos from several sources. Plays the videos well too on HD. Good.
reviews.author: Al Lee

reviews.title: Dailymotion Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Great app but dailymotion videos don\'t play and I don\'t see why vimeo can\'t play over high speed cellular connection. Also wish vids would keep playing in the background while you do other things in app like search for more videos to add to your playlist.
reviews.author: Kristopher Peggs

reviews.title: Video size
reviews.comment: In anything other than full hd, videos use only half of the available screen space.   Other than that, It\'s a great app which shows Google what a YouTube app should really look like.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Thank you so much for making an app that can play \"Watch Later\" continuously back-to-back. I\'ve been looking hard for for that feature in an android app.
reviews.author: Tom QuantFXcapital

reviews.title: , Not perfect but still awesome
reviews.comment: Great fast app. And i love how you can choose your interests as a home page. But it could be better if: You could have your subscriptions as intrests Could comment and like.
reviews.author: Peter Gibbons

reviews.title: Progress bar needed
reviews.comment: Everything is great. It just needs a progress/loading bar to see how much of the video is loaded. Add a ability to comment and set as default YouTube player and it would be perfect.
reviews.author: Andrew Breedy

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Its great cause its great you can play videos in hd even vimeo! My life died and the started again when i saw this app and tried it.Download it i reccomend its really good! x
reviews.author: Kate Louise x

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love this app.will give 5 stars if the app shows up in the list  when you click a youtube link in a browser or another app.
reviews.author: Hassam Naveed

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: Fantastic work!
reviews.author: pc oruganti

reviews.title: Not good youtube account access
reviews.comment: Can\'t load YouTube favorites Nor play list
reviews.author: grayson smith

reviews.title: Watch vimeo in HD!
reviews.comment: I love this app because I can finally watch my vimeo videos in HD on my mobile device! And since the native vimeo app don\'t allow it I will be using this one only from now on.
reviews.author: micah bowen

reviews.title: Not Good Enough
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t show none mobile videos & its overly complicated.
reviews.author: Alex Lee

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Its dope
reviews.author: Matlin mompremier

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Needs subscriptions and comments etc. Then it gets 5 stars.
reviews.author: Mordechai R

reviews.comment: Excellent I can watch youtube on my express in full hd
reviews.author: Joshua Carroll

reviews.title: Crash, Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 & 10.1
reviews.comment: Always crash when starting video
reviews.author: Caturatmaja Adi Cahya

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Markel Markus

reviews.title: Brilliant App
reviews.comment: What can I say about this app ? Plays everything and more much better than YouTube
reviews.author: jon wren
